channel.title: Help with hiscores! [Please help!] #
channel.description:
Hello guys i'm using 000webhost.com and i have made my hiscores: http://legacypro.net16.net/highscores/highscores.php
And when i add the database and username, password etc to my server files it will not connect to it on the website
And i was wondering do i have to pay for premium to make it connect? Or is there any other website that provide a free SQL witch will connect to the server files?
Thanks - King

Do you have team-viewer sir im confused

item.title: Help with hiscores! [Please help!] #
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

It won’t work from 000webhost I’m pretty sure (from the fact that most other MySQL shit doesn’t work from there either). Did you try using the download version of MySQL?

Read full topic
